website_summaries.verdict: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron offers some entertaining action, lots of explosions, and few surprises.
pros: Flight levels are great funSeveral sequences make you feel remarkably powerfulRoller coaster of a final levelStrong cooperative and competitive play
cons: Unfocused campaign is too often more exciting to watch than to playFinal encounter is a jokeLevel design at odds with shooting model

customer_reviews.title: Fun but quick Transformer game.
customer_reviews.text: My nine-year-old loves this game. He has it at his dad's but he enjoys playing it so much that he insisted in having it at my house as well. It is a fairly short game however, as it features multiplayer, online play. It follows comic story lines and allows you to play as multiple characters, both autobots and deceptions as the story progresses.
customer_reviews.author: Elizabeth

customer_reviews.title: Incredibly diverse and adictive
customer_reviews.text: At first when I bought Fall of Cybertron I thought it was just going to be a mediocre game. Actually, it was just amazing! Each level and character are incredibly cool, the game starts to cook when you start using Cliffjumper and after that it's pure fun. Grimlock is awesome, the levels are awesome... I'm really satisfied with it. The only thing that might lack is more cinematics. Can't get enough of them to be sincere. Lasted less that 15 days to finish it. It was totally adictive. The Dinobot and insecticon retcon from G1 is pretty clever too.
customer_reviews.author: Josue Chaves

customer_reviews.title: Must buy. Awesome game.
customer_reviews.text: THIS GAME IS AWESOME! I can't believe I missed out on this game it is sooooo good I was skeptical because it's a transformers game and we all know how game companies sometimes ruin favorite heroes/characters but my GOD do these guys do it justice the sotry is great and freakin epic if you're a transformers fan you'll see many familiar faces but even if you're new to the series it does a good job of introducing the characters. Transforming from bot to vehicle mode is flippin great and never gets old anyway this is a must buy!
customer_reviews.author: indarkened

customer_reviews.title: Fake copy
customer_reviews.text: The seller who sold this sent inpirated copy and burnt my old PlayStation 3 I’m owned. This inferior product ruined my sustem. I’ve played the original 1st one, a legit copy. Please be careful of piracy items. I’ve been a victim a free tjmes
customer_reviews.author: Nanaki

customer_reviews.title: Superb from start to finish!
customer_reviews.text: This game is a bit short (10 hours or so for campaign) but absolutely sweet! Visuals are great, plot and gameplay are both excellent, and sound effects are outstanding. In addition, the variety of weapons, enemies, and playable characters was surprisingly diverse. The only negative I found was that on some missions, it can feel a bit unfair when you are faced with dozens of enemies at once. Overall, excellent game! Highly recommended!
customer_reviews.author: DJ_King_SD

customer_reviews.title: GREAT GAME.
customer_reviews.text: i think this game was done well it really brings the transformers to life, the greatest thing about this game is the ability to play multiple characters throughout story mode and keep switching every mission between transformers and the level designs are beautifully done,and the enemy A.I. is challenging on normal and hard modes. Multiplayer is fast paced and has a ferocity to it, i think its a great buy for any age group.
customer_reviews.author: kevin

customer_reviews.title: Father son time
customer_reviews.text: I bought for my 5yr son who loves transformers didnt think i would be able to play im no good at games but very impressed and he loves it wont stop about wanting me to play the game for him never been a transformer fan but its growing on me
customer_reviews.author: Raymond

customer_reviews.title: Best Transformers Game Ever!!
customer_reviews.text: I have played many transformers games, and until I played War for Cybertron, I wasn't very impressed. Then i played War for Cybertron and I didn't think another Transformers game would outdo it. Well, I am very happy I was mistaken. This game is by far the best Transformers game ever and the story, while kind of short, is amazing. I haven't gotten to the multiplayer, but if its anything like War for Cybertron, it will be awesome. I highly recommend this game to any Transformers fans out there.
customer_reviews.author: Derek

customer_reviews.title: Worth buying
customer_reviews.text: My son loves this game! It keeps him quiet and busy
customer_reviews.author: Ny

customer_reviews.title: love transformers
customer_reviews.text: the story mode is a lot of fun with improvements over the last game (war for cybertron), but the online multiplayer is still full of the same bugs and glitches that war for cybertron had as well as some new ones. Also it gets old looking at the host migration screen whenever someone rage quits, loses internet connection ect. Overall this is a fun game with good replay value ALSO the DLC is overpriced
customer_reviews.author: Jason

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Bought this as birthday present for my son, he loves it.
customer_reviews.author: Stefanie K.

customer_reviews.title: Transform and Roll Out!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!!! :D
customer_reviews.text: Outstanding game that provides the ultimate immersion into the Transformers world. I have just started playing, but am excited to have already been able to play as Bumblebee and Optimus, and I know that I will get to be some gnarly Decepticons and Grimlock, the Dinobot leader!!! I happen to be a diehard fan, yet even for casual TF fans, this is still a winner.
customer_reviews.author: John

customer_reviews.title: Really fun game.
customer_reviews.text: Really fun game. My 11 year old son enjoyed the Transformers games and they are much better than letting him play a totally inappropriate M rated game. The story is true to the original transformers story line and I enjoyed watching him play as I used to watch the cartoon at his age. The multiplayer adds a lot of replay value.
customer_reviews.author: Jay

customer_reviews.title: for transformer fans
customer_reviews.text: If you enjoyed the first game "war for cybertron", you'll love this game. The developer high moon studio took what they made and build upon it, from changing the characters you play to adding on to the story they started on the last game. If your a transformers fan it's a good game, from the single player campaign to the multi-player- which is team deathmatch, capture the node(flag), and some other pvp matches.
customer_reviews.author: Jose  R.  Rodriguez  jr.

customer_reviews.title: Transformers:Fall of Cybertron PS3
customer_reviews.text: Bought this game for my grandson. I am sure he will love it.
customer_reviews.author: Dickki

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game is great. Third person shooters are my favorite type of games and I love shooters that speed up the action and rely less on cover. Vanquish is another game where u spend less time in cover. The controls are tight and this game is great so far.
customer_reviews.author: bryce1234

customer_reviews.title: Nothing to fear here.
customer_reviews.text: Bought this being skeptical of buying used games online since the stores have burned me so much with them. This was in excellent quality and I'd have no problem buying used games like this. Super fast shipping too. Said 1 week for 2 and it was 6 days. Thanks.
customer_reviews.author: Rusty Bryant

customer_reviews.title: amazing game
customer_reviews.text: i love this game its better than the first war for cybertron, i love the new game plus and i played through it a dozen times and it has a much better story than the first one. now the con multiplayer is fun at first but it gets repetitive and there's no real matching making for new players so if you just start you will be paired with lvl 25 players vs 1 and vice versa. now this is the type of multiplayer you wish had more modes or at least a co-op feature
customer_reviews.author: Leo Taveras

customer_reviews.title: I love this game!
customer_reviews.text: I don't usually play too many shooter games, but I thoroughly enjoy this game. It might be a tad simple for fps veterans, but for the casual gamer like myself, it's great.
customer_reviews.author: Paul

customer_reviews.title: For my son
customer_reviews.text: We ordered this and it came super quick. lol. A lot quicker than I expected. my son played it and he seems very happy w/ it. The price was good, it arrived sooner than expected & the kid seemed happy. What more could I ask for?
customer_reviews.author: Mayflower

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: im a huge transformers fan and ive got to say i like these games way more than the movies being able to play through the start of the great war is awesome though i didnt like every level i would highly recommend this game to anyone
customer_reviews.author: curtis blissard

customer_reviews.title: Transformers!! More than meets the eye!
customer_reviews.text: Loved this game. Fast delivery. My kids Loved It!!! Perfectly in theme with the movie! Not bad for the PS3.
customer_reviews.author: CT Reviews

customer_reviews.title: Good Game
customer_reviews.text: A lot of fun but sort of short. For some reason they reduced Optimus' power between War and this one, but it is still a blast to play as all of the different characters. Grimlock is very therapeutic.
customer_reviews.author: MKP

customer_reviews.title: One of the Best Transformers Game!
customer_reviews.text: My son loves it! He says this game is one of best transfomer games so far. (He says he hasn't played Transformers Devastation to compare yet) He recommends this to any PS3 owners who are fans of the Transfomers franchise.
customer_reviews.author: Maria Iglesias

customer_reviews.title: Cool game
customer_reviews.text: This game is a lot of fun, looks great ant the story is interesting. It's fun being able to play as an autobot and decepticon. I definitely recommend this to anyone who likes the transformers.
customer_reviews.author: Frank E.

customer_reviews.title: Best Transformers Game YET!!
customer_reviews.text: GREAT GAME...I have both this game and the first one (Transformers: War for Cybertron) and I have to say hands down this is such a better game. The multi-player alone would be a reason to buy this game. The single player story was well done, both compelling and fitting within the pre-existing Transformers Universe with no issues. Also playing as Grimlock, while it took a few minutes to get used to compared with how the other characters play, was one of the coolest things ever for a fan of the original series, comics, Beast Wars and Beast Machines.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Three Stars
customer_reviews.text: Not bad!!! Not into the game at the moment!!! Thought it would be more exciting. Just my opinion!
customer_reviews.author: ALAN

customer_reviews.title: Love this game can't stop playing it
customer_reviews.text: From before the release of this game the trailers persuaded me to purchase this game the day it got here as soon as I got it I started playing n now I'm addicted the story is alot better than the movies and I loved the movies you won't regret buying this
customer_reviews.author: The Great One

customer_reviews.title: Okay...
customer_reviews.text: It was a good game, but i had higher expectations for it. The customization is pretty cool, but the multiplayer was hard to get into. The campaign was quite repetitive as-well.
customer_reviews.author: Kely

customer_reviews.title: Gaming fun for the entire family.
customer_reviews.text: My son is a huge Transformers fan and enjoys playing this game. I've played it and enjoyed it and even my wife has played it. It's fun and challenging for the whole family. Great graphics too.
customer_reviews.author: Anthony

customer_reviews.title: this is awsome
customer_reviews.text: i have had the first game for a few years so when my son asked for this i thought why not. and im glad i did because he loves it and hasnt put it down since it came through the door money well spent thank you
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Excelent game
customer_reviews.text: Better than the War for Cyberton game, however I liked in the previous game that you can choose 3 different bots in each mission and in this one you can only choose 1 per level...still a very good game and more difficult than its previous... If you are a transformers fan this is a must have.
customer_reviews.author: Cliente de Kindle

customer_reviews.title: best transformers game yet
customer_reviews.text: this game is great in terms of gameplay its really fun weather u are a transformers fan or not, also if you are a fan then this game will be great for you i recommend it to anyone looking for a great phone game
customer_reviews.author: Adrian Sayers

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: kids love this game. onlydraw back is its a 1 player game and 12 person multiplayer on a network.
customer_reviews.author: d_Rav

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Brought it for my nephew for the holidays he loves it . It came on time no issues.
customer_reviews.author: carolann

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: I'm very involved with this game right now, insane story and great setting/visuals/etc. First PS3 game I actually WANTED to download DLC for it. Skyrim would be the following.
customer_reviews.author: Braggaglorp

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: The game mechanics are great and graphic awesome. It is a very smooth game and my son loves to watch it played.
customer_reviews.author: Kcat Hutton

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: product arrived on time and are very good, a responsible person is recommended.
customer_reviews.author: jesus

customer_reviews.title: Fun sequel
customer_reviews.text: Different from the first game but, c'mon now, it's Peter Cullen as Optimus and Gregg Bergger as Grimlock... I say more.....?

customer_reviews.title: Best Transformers game ever!
customer_reviews.text: This one is simply beautiful all around. Great game play and story line. I loved War, but Fall is everything I wanted and more.
customer_reviews.author: GraveShift

customer_reviews.title: Great game.
customer_reviews.text: I love the Transformers movies, but have been disappointed by the horrible video games. This one is by far the best. I lovei t... they did a great job.

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: the game worked just fine. came looking brand new. i didn't have any problems at all. thank you and i will be doing more business wit you.

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game
customer_reviews.text: This was a game my son saw last year in the stores. It was too expensive at the time to purchase. When his birthday came around this year, I jumped at the chance to buy it for a great price. He totally loves the game. Product is in excellent condition and arrived in time for his birthday.
customer_reviews.author: Roxana Veraldi-Michel

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: This game proved its worthiness and has been everything i expected to be and more. Every level i played was just an adventure especially a big fan of the transformers genre. I was a little disappointed with the freezing at some check points of the game. I would have to start the whole level again or beat it, to me it made the game unplayable. but overall it was game that be my top pick on my list.

customer_reviews.title: Great for boys

customer_reviews.text: This was a Christmas gift for my son. He says the colors and graphics are great and that it's a lot of fun to play, so I have to assume that it deserves 5 stars!

customer_reviews.text: Excellent game, outstanding audio and graphics. Very challenging so it allows for many hours of entertainment

customer_reviews.text: loved it!!! my 6 year old has already beat it and is still playing it over and over if your a fan of transformers this game is for you

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: This transformers game and war for cybertron are the best transformers video games I have found. Arrived quickly. Thanks

customer_reviews.title: great game
customer_reviews.text: Great game really reflected back to the gen 1 transformers

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, good quality and as advertised.
customer_reviews.text: My son counted down the days for this games arrival. Once he got it he was busy playing. He really enjoys playing this game. Good product with fast shipping.

customer_reviews.title: By far the best Transformers game I have ever played
customer_reviews.text: By far the best Transformers game I have ever played. Not only is it rich with lore and loyal to the source material, it's incredibly fun to play.

customer_reviews.title: Great Product. Shipped Fast.
customer_reviews.text: This item shipped with three days. Same item as in stores that my fiance has been looking at, but for a lot cheaper price.

customer_reviews.title: Loved the game online also.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent Game, Except for...
customer_reviews.text: It is an awesome game, love it I'm fact. But when I first got it it started lagging in campaign mode. It was really bugging me because I was waiting for it to deliver. It finally got to my house in about 2 weeks. Again, great game, loved the multiplayer mode.
customer_reviews.author: Ethan Garcia

customer_reviews.title: transformers
customer_reviews.text: this game is my favorite because since I played the first Super finino was but the continuation was encreible with the giant Dinobots, the final battle between optimus and megatron also the campaign you wear so great challenges to achieve supremacy

customer_reviews.title: Action-Action!
customer_reviews.text: Is a great game for share and play with other people online. My son loved. He played every day with this game.
customer_reviews.author: taishaly

customer_reviews.title: Love playing as other characters too
customer_reviews.text: As gorgeous as the first game. Love playing as other characters too.
customer_reviews.author: John Rhogan

customer_reviews.title: fun but disappointing sequel.
customer_reviews.text: Recommended to transformers fans only. The escalation mode is a little disappointing and the lack of story mode co-op may prevent this title from reaching the heights of the original but it is still a fun game in it's own right.
customer_reviews.author: robert

customer_reviews.title: Kinda meh
customer_reviews.text: No coop mode.. But it was kinda fun. Plus the game is very blurry when compared to War for Cybertron
customer_reviews.author: Superhippy1986

customer_reviews.title: AWESOME !!!!
customer_reviews.text: IT WAS A VERY AWESOME DEAL, I WAS LOOKING FOR THIS GAME ON GAME STOP BUT FOR $27 USED... NO COOL... BUT THANKS GOD I FOUND THIS SELLER, THEY ALSO SEND ME AN EXTRA GAME (BRAND NEW) FOR FREE =] SO HAPPY...
customer_reviews.author: Jorge

customer_reviews.title: Mindless fun
customer_reviews.text: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is a ton a fun with a few cons (hahaha...). I enjoyed playing as some of my favorite Autobots and Decepticons. The gameplay tries to be diverse and not just shooting up enemies. I think they did a great job in mixing it up. Jazz has a grappling hook, stealth as CliffJumper, causing total chaos as the giant Bruticus, etc. The story isn't anything spectacular, autobots are just trying to leave a dying Cybertron as Decepticons try to stop you. My game did freeze about 3 times throughout the whole game and loaded at odd times. Overall, I would recommend this game!
customer_reviews.author: nephykupo

customer_reviews.title: yay robots!
customer_reviews.text: Great game. Good replay value. I love being able to make my own transformer. Hopefully there will be another sequel.
customer_reviews.author: Robert

customer_reviews.title: Childhood memories
customer_reviews.text: As a little kid, i had a lot of Transformer-comic books and toys. It's a good thing that a gamestudio made such a excellent game. Now i can live my childhood memories again.
customer_reviews.author: Esa Dahl

customer_reviews.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Playstation 3
customer_reviews.text: I ordered it for my grandson and he loves it. He is in fact playing it as I write this review. He has had it for several months and the fact that he is still loving it says enough for me.
customer_reviews.author: Wanda A. Miller

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Very good game, bought it for my nephew and he is entertain.
customer_reviews.author: brenda

customer_reviews.title: Transformers fall of cybertron
customer_reviews.text: This game have a great action and a good story line I recommend this game to every one the only thing I don't like is they should of made it longer
customer_reviews.author: Willow

customer_reviews.title: great
customer_reviews.text: It was good because it had the dinobots, megatron's death, and it had really cool imaging and characters. 12 year old son LOVES this.
customer_reviews.author: KATALINA NANCE

customer_reviews.title: Four Stars
customer_reviews.text: Fun game. My only issue is that you can't mute people online.

customer_reviews.title: great game.
customer_reviews.text: My boys both enjoyed playing as the transformers they know plus creating their own in multiplayer mode. I enjoyed the story mode ad well.

customer_reviews.title: Explosive
customer_reviews.text: Lots of great action you get to play as a dinobot awesome

customer_reviews.title: transformers fall of cybertron
customer_reviews.text: I think this is one of the best tranfomer games yet. Just love it, multiplayer very fun and it is cool how you can custimize your own character.

customer_reviews.title: Great Buy
customer_reviews.text: This was a gift for my nephew. He was excited to receive this game. I was just glad to receive it so fast and the price was low on it.
customer_reviews.author: R3luhtiv Clothing

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Besides war for cybertron this title is the other must have for transformers fans with a ps3. One word Grimlock!

customer_reviews.title: Constant Action
customer_reviews.text: Great game for Transformer fans, action-intense gamers, 3rd player shooters and old school 80s fans. If u like shooting weapons, blowing things up and incredible gameplay then you'll highly enjoy this version of Transformers.
customer_reviews.author: Zerogravity

customer_reviews.title: Saves time on Google
customer_reviews.text: My son loves video games but he frequently goes online to find help. This will save him time running back and forth from computer to game.
customer_reviews.author: SouthernMissy

customer_reviews.title: Must have for playing the game
customer_reviews.text: Husband is very pleased to have this as his christmas gift. He loves transformers, so how could I go wrong with this.
customer_reviews.author: stacia

customer_reviews.title: The Definitive Transformers Game
customer_reviews.text: If you're looking for an excellent Transformers game, look no further. Taking place after War for Cybertron, the war between the Decepticons and Autobots continue and Optimus is faced with a difficult decision. Stand his ground and risk the lives of fellow Autobots or leave Cybertron to fight another day. Containing a lengthy single player campaign and an excellent multiplayer experience.
customer_reviews.author: Cassandre Presume

customer_reviews.title: What I've been waiting for almost 20 years
customer_reviews.text: This game is just awesome, the story, the graphics, the sound, everything is far beyond my expectations. I feel so happy to be alive in a time when this game is available.
customer_reviews.author: Gerarlop

customer_reviews.title: perfect
customer_reviews.text: Came new, still warped, great price at the time (saved 6$), plays great, had 2 glitches in campaign but finished the game just fine.
customer_reviews.author: J. Strand

customer_reviews.title: Transformers game is a hit
customer_reviews.text: JR had this on his wish list, so I knew he'd love it. He was very excited to get this game.
customer_reviews.author: Darrell

customer_reviews.title: Great single and multiplayer game
customer_reviews.text: We all know the story of what happens, but this game covers pretty well HOW it happened. The multiplayer is a lot of fun as well!

customer_reviews.title: transformers fall of cybertron
customer_reviews.text: this game is worth the money hrs of fun and online play works great i played it over, over and online add on are worth the money also for this game

customer_reviews.title: Awesome game for the price
customer_reviews.text: Awesome game! The story and the graphics were great. I also recommend the prequel called War for Cybertron.

customer_reviews.title: It's Transformers What's Not To Love
customer_reviews.text: This is a Christmas gift for my son, so haven't played it yet. As I said in the title it's Transformers so what's not to love.

customer_reviews.title: Haven't played online yet.
customer_reviews.text: This is a very fun game and the transformers are great! Still need to try online though. I would recommend this gameto anyone.

customer_reviews.title: My son loves Transformers
customer_reviews.text: My son enjoys playing this game. He has been buying most of the Transformers game. I wanted him to add this one to his collection.
customer_reviews.author: cindy gentil

customer_reviews.title: game
customer_reviews.text: My husband loved it. He was so excited to get this game. It was good to get it so fast.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: good
customer_reviews.text: Plenty of characters but was expecting more like SaintsRow III. Looking for more roaming in the game. Gives you more options.
customer_reviews.author: Dionicio Jaramillo

customer_reviews.title: Great game
customer_reviews.text: Only problem I have is how weak Optimus Prime is at the outset...I mean, c'mon, it's supposed to be based off of G1 Transformers..Optimus Prime should have been portrayed better. Other than that, the game was exceptional with the only flaw being the aforementioned portrayal.
customer_reviews.author: Shawn

customer_reviews.title: Beast of a Game
customer_reviews.text: Games like this put the FUN back into gaming, it gave me that old feeling i got when you got off the school bus and ran home just to catch the next episode. GRIMLOCK for President!!!!!!!!!
customer_reviews.author: R Singleton Sr

customer_reviews.title: Great Game!
customer_reviews.text: I love the game, it's much better than the first one. And that's saying quite a lot. Playing as the dinobots is more than gratifying. However, I didn't receive my Bruticus (G2) pre-order bonus (I usually get the bonuses emailed to me before the game even arrives at my house). I contacted Amazon to check in on it. And all they have to tell me is, "We cannot verify that we offered a pre-order bonus for this game". I'll update this in a few days. But it's looking like I got the ol' bait & switch.
customer_reviews.author: K. Scott

customer_reviews.title: Poor Graphics
customer_reviews.text: The game play is good. The game would be that much more impressive if the graphic designers of this game actually took some time to make better graphics. For a PS3 game it has poor graphics.
customer_reviews.author: Orme12

customer_reviews.title: Awesome
customer_reviews.text: It was a great Transformers game I have ever played So I definitely loved it and will never quit playing it
customer_reviews.author: Ruben

customer_reviews.title: Awsome
customer_reviews.text: Game was in great condition brand new. Love the game on all levels and online matches. Hopeing they make a beast wars game soon that would be awesome and would be the first since playstion
customer_reviews.author: Dante

customer_reviews.title: Excellent game - Has everything
customer_reviews.text: I played this game as soon it was realeased. The first thing to say is that the graphics are just excellent. The gameplay is also great and you are going to discovered a lot of carachters during the gsame that were on the tv series and the comic....epic moment when appears metroplex...just epic....if you can make it to the last levels you will have to prepare for a lot of adrenaline...you are going to play with the autobots and the decepticons a lot of battles. Great gaqme...great graphics...great carachters...great price...if you are a transformers fan you must have this one.
customer_reviews.author: SEBASTIAN

customer_reviews.title: it was nice that they tried to go back to the old ...
customer_reviews.text: it was nice that they tried to go back to the old school transformers although there were quite a few variations. graphics were cartoonish but good. certain parts of the the game were really difficult and frustrating at times but i still managed to finish the game. the storyline was not the best but i still enjoyed playing this game.
customer_reviews.author: Metalhead

customer_reviews.title: Fun game
customer_reviews.text: I love Transformers, and I've been a fan since I was a kid in the 80s. Love the lore and this game adds to it. Only thing I wish for the game was for more campaign missions and playing more Grimlock. It upgrades on the previous game in graphics, play style, and story. Not that it was lacking in any of that anyway. If you liked the first one, you will like this one too. I would buy again.
customer_reviews.author: Spawnie7

customer_reviews.title: Best Transformers game yet
customer_reviews.text: I'm a geek. I've loved Transformers since they came out in the 80s. I've liked the games, but thought they were a bit or a bore - my interest has kept on this one. I like it quite a lot - no, it's not the "movie" Transformers, but it's so much better than any of the movie-based games.
customer_reviews.author: C. R. Smith

customer_reviews.title: Great harder than the first one but still
customer_reviews.text: This game is awesome. It was a little more difficult than the first one, but over all its great and has an orginal Transformers feel to it. It is nothing like the bayformers.
customer_reviews.author: nerdsunite

product_meta.title: Transformers: Fall of Cybertron - Playstation 3
product_meta.description:
Transformers: Fall of Cybertron transports you to the final days of the planet Cybertron where you will experience the darkest hours of the apocalyptic war between the Autobots and Decepticons.

AMAZON.COM


 Transformers: Fall of Cybertron is a third-person shooter that returns players to the Transformer's planet of Cybertron for the final battles of the legendary war that preceded their arrival on Earth. The game continues the story of the earlier game, Transformers: War for Cybertron. Players experience the war from both the Autobot and Decepticon point of view, and utilize new powerful transformer types. Additional features include: epic large scale battles, character specific abilities, character customization, improved enemy AI, varied mission play, and online multiplayer. 

Live the last days of the fight for Cybertron.
View larger Utilize powerful, new Transformer types.
View larger EXPERIENCE THE LAST DAYS OF CYBERTRON
 Transformers: Fall of Cybertron transports you to the final days of the planet Cybertron where you will experience the darkest hours of the apocalyptic war between the Autobots and Decepticons. Embark on an adrenaline-fueled journey through a wide range of missions and massive environments designed around each character's unique abilities. Fight through both sides of the most epic battles leading to their legendary exodus from their homeworld. In addition, players experience action in the form of new Transformer bot types Combaticons, Insecticons, and Dinobots. 

KEY GAME FEATURES
 * Apocalyptic Setting - Set in a desolate, post-apocalyptic Cybertron, the game thrusts players straight into an epic Transformers story as seen through the eyes of both the Autobots and Decepticons. From the Iacon Wasteland, to The Sea of Rust, explore the devastated ruins of Cybertron and play through the final, darkest hours of the war.
 * New Kinds of Transformers - Expand the action with new Transformers, including Combaticons, Insecticons, and Dinobots.
 * Characters Convert from Robot to Alternate Form - Characters convert from robot to alternate mode to defeat their enemies. Grimlock can change into his powerful T-Rex Dinobot form for super strength and fire-breathing attack, and the Combaticons can combine into the massive Bruticus to dominate his enemies with this sheer size and power.
 * Impactful Gameplay Variety - Every character is equipped with distinct abilities and personalities that are suited for each of the diverse missions in the game. Cliffjumper can cloak himself invisible to unleash undetected stealth kills on his enemies. Optimus Prime can call in targeted artillery strikes from the sky.
 * Massive Customization with Character Creator - The most robust character creator ever seen in a Transformers game allows fans to design personalized characters from scratch by choosing their individual body parts, colors, vehicle shapes, weapons, abilities and more. Gamers can then take them online to go head-to-head in brutal Autobot vs. Decepticon matches to prove their supremacy.
 * Epic Scale - Fall of Cybertron delivers epic battle on a massive scale. The settings and the characters are huge. Battlefields will quake with the with the fury of gigantic Transformers, and the city-sized Autobot Metroplex changes the scale of everything.
 * Multiplayer with Truly Custom Transformers - The battle continues online with thrilling multiplayer combat. Drop into deep multiplayer modes with with up to 12 players. Create your own Transformers using a character creator that offers unprecedented choice.
 * New AI System - Players are challenged in the single-player campaign by improved enemy artificial intelligence.

ADDITIONAL SCREENSHOTS
12-player online support.
View larger Action on an epic scale.
View larger Diverse missions & gameplay.
View larger Improved AI system.
View larger
